title: Weird Promo Interaction
body:
Hi, So recently I did a Gold 1 series to be put into Plat V. I lost the first 2 games and then won the next 3 and instead of being promoted I was put into another series in gold 1 for Plat V. What's going on here?

Thanks

replies.body:
Hey jeracles,

Is it possible that you dodged your 5th match (counting as an automatic loss) to lose your series, and won the next match which was enough to put you into series again? You can submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and Player Support may be able to verify for you. Give them the links to your series matches from your match history page.

-DTN
